title: Don't require location capability simply to contruct a Geopoint
body: According to the docs here - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.devices.geolocation.geopoint.-ctor#Windows_Devices_Geolocation_Geopoint__ctor_Windows_Devices_Geolocation_BasicGeoposition_ - the location capability is required simply to construct a Geopoint. I just want to use a Geopoint with the GeotagHelper to get/set GPS info in a file. I don't want to access the user's location. The location capability should not be required in this case. If this is just a docs issue, please update the docs.
